entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as grabbing Hermione and pulling her to the ground. He is also seen trying to reach Umbridge's wand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is grabbed by Harry and pulled to the ground. She does not have any other actions described in this passage.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is shrieking and yelling as she is seized by Bane. She attempts to Stun one of the centaurs with her wand.

entities.name: bane
entities.description: Bane is described as seizing Umbridge from behind and lifting her high into the air.

relationships.description: Harry grabs Hermione and pulls her to the ground, indicating that he is trying to protect her.
Umbridge is seized from behind by Bane.
